item.title: DevOps Beware: The Sad Truth About SOPS and Secret Management
item.description: I’ve read everywhere the miracles of using SOPS within a project to maintain the secrets in a secure way within the source code of the project, or even for GitOps and CI/CD pipelines. But, is it really that secure? Let’s buckle up for a wild ride through the chaotic world of secret management. Strap in tightly because we’re about to explore why SOPS falls short in being a secret management superhero we’ve been told.
